    public class MainActivity
extends androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity
    Author:

    Abdul Mukit
    Department of Computer Science of Engineering
    Jahangirnagar University



    Main Activity is the launcher acticity that initiate that program.
    It is designed for Creating Product.
    Only Admin can access this activity

        protected void onActivityResult(int requestCode,
                                int resultCode,
                                @Nullable
                                Intent data)
        After choosing a file from storage this method execute to receive it data.getData() contain a URI that is the mapping of the file.
        Overrides:
        onActivityResult in class androidx.fragment.app.FragmentActivity
        Parameters:
        requestCode - Uniquely identify the file
        resultCode - Check if full content received or not
        data - hold the content of the file

      • uploadData

        public void uploadData()
        This gather all the Product information inputted by user as
        product name, price, Image URI that contain the image data, and product description.
        It then save the information in the Product class object
        Finally it call DatabaseHelper to upload the product in firebase databasse
